job description:
Strategic Alliance Consulting Inc. is seeking a technically qualified and cleared individual to incorporate big data analytic skills for holistic collection assessments.

Develop method to incorporate large intelligence collection data that supports all-source collection assessments which allow decision makers enough time to make well informed ISR allocation decisions within the annual Global Force Management process but also within crisis situations.
  • TS/SCI clearance.
  • Proficient in the Microsoft Office Suite, big data analytic systems, Python software, Data visualization tools, as well as tasking systems/applications of various collection disciplines
  • This list of requirements is not all inclusive and is subject to change as systems, processes and the needs of the supported command or agency change.
